dict.acceptation: 太阳，阳光；恒星；中心人物；

sent.orig: Sun is on its ninth restructuring to cut costs and continues to slice jobs.
sent.trans: Sun正在实施第九次重组，计划削减成本并继续裁减员工。

sent.orig: Mr Ellison is keen on two bits of Sun's software portfolio in particular.
sent.trans: 埃里森先生对于Sun的两个软件特别感兴趣。

sent.orig: Jini technology of Sun is a new solution in the field of distributed computing.
sent.trans: SUN公司提出的Jini技术是分布式计算领域的一种全新方式。

sent.orig: I remember Graham receiving a Sun newspaper TV award from Reggie Maudling.
sent.trans: 我记得那次Graham接受由Sun新闻报ReggieMaudling颁发的电视大奖。

sent.orig: Sun Report Builder creates stylish, complex database reports.
sent.trans: Sun报表生成器可以创建时尚，复杂的数据库报表。
